title: Online Shoppers Purchasing Intention
description: Dataset for real-time prediction of online shoppers purchasing intention.

target.name: Revenue
target.description: Binary variable indicating visitor session ending in shopping (1) or not (0)

features.name: Administrative
features.description: Number of different "Administrative" pages visited in the session

features.name: Administrative_Duration
features.description: Total time spent on "Administrative" pages in the session

features.name: Informational
features.description: Number of different "Informational" pages visited in the session

features.name: Informational_Duration
features.description: Total time spent on "Informational" pages in the session

features.name: ProductRelated
features.description: Number of different "ProductRelated" pages visited in the session

features.name: ProductRelated_Duration
features.description: Total time spent on "ProductRelated" pages in the session

features.name: BounceRates
features.description: Bounce Rate metric from Google Analytics - refers to percentage of visitors who enter the site from that page and then leave ("bounce") without triggering any other requests to the analytics server during that session

features.name: ExitRates
features.description: Exit Rate metric from Google Analytics. The value of "Exit Rate" feature for a specific web page is calculated as for all pageviews to the page, the percentage that were the last in the session.

features.name: PageValues
features.description: Page Value metric from google Analytics - represents the average value for a web page that a user visited before completing an e-commerce transaction

features.name: SpecialDay
features.description: Indicates the closeness of the site visiting time to a specific special day (e.g. Mother's Day, Valentine's Day) in which the sessions are more likely to be finalized with transaction

features.name: TrafficType
features.description: Traffic type (categories 1 to 20) - information of types not provided in dataset

features.name: Weekend
features.description: Is the session on weekend or weekday
